DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this feasibility study is to develop and initially test a dialogue-based psychosocial intervention aimed at promoting coping and psychosocial wellbeing following an acute stroke. The intervention is carried out by primary care registered nurses or other appropriate health professionals. The intervention included persons with and without aphasia.
DOC.criteria: 18 years old or above acute stroke 48 weeks poststroke Exclusion Criteria Other serious disease
